body_html: Some progress made here. Tracked down the bug that was causing issues with Distribution strategies not using MultiDeviceIterator by default. Now Distribution strategies uses MultiDeviceIterator. Now I'll work on getting MultiDeviceIterator to work with get_next_as_optional and expose that API end point.

Now Distribution strategies uses MultiDeviceIterator. Now I'll work on getting MultiDeviceIterator to work with get_next_as_optional and expose that API end point.
body: Some progress made here. Tracked down the bug that was causing issues with Distribution strategies not using MultiDeviceIterator by default. Now Distribution strategies uses MultiDeviceIterator. Now I'll work on getting MultiDeviceIterator to work with get_next_as_optional and expose that API end point.
